## Type of Change
<!-- Add the appropriate label to your PR -->
- [ ] `patch` - Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] `minor` - New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] `major` - Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] `skip-release` - Skip automatic release (for docs, tests, CI changes)

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have added the appropriate version label (`major`, `minor`, `patch`, or `skip-release`)

---

**Auto-Release:** When this PR is merged, a release will be automatically created based on the version label. The new version will be tagged and published with Docker images and binaries.
